headline: Workday 2025 Spring Release: 350+ New Features, Updates, and AI Enhancements to Streamline HR and Finance Processes for Customers Around the World
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people and money, today announced more than 350 product features and updates across the Workday platform, now available to customers worldwide. These updates include innovations across talent management, the Workday user experience, and finance – all designed to streamline business workflows, fuel organizational agility, and help customers navigate the future of work.
